lines.text: Rinny, your sister Fern. Does she brush her teeth? Because once she smiled at me and I swear I couldn't use my dick for like a year.
If your brains were dynamite, you wouldn't have enough to blow your ass.
I have no idea why I'm going to Canada.
Naked women, Tim. You love naked women.
He doesn't like you. He's dead. He doesn't like anything anymore... he's... he's void of opinion. That man survived the death camps of Nazi Germany only to eventually succumb to an evening with YOU.
This man survived the concentration camps. And then he met YOU.
